entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Drizzle or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to drizzle this evening then to snow before morning. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:21 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:21 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
